price: Dã waɗanda suka kãfirta sunã sanin lõkacin da bã su kange wuta daga fuskõkinsu, kuma haka daga bãyayyakinsu, alhãli kuwa ba su zama ana taimakon su ba.
arabic: لَوۡ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ حِينَ لَا يَكُفُّونَ عَن وُجُوهِهِمُ ٱلنَّارَ وَلَا عَن ظُهُورِهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: law yaʿlamu alladhīna kafarū ḥīna lā yakuffūna ʿan wujūhihimu al-nāra walā ʿan ẓuhūrihim walā hum yunṣarūna
